  • Method Details

    • getGameName

      String getGameName()
      Gets the game name.
      Returns:
      the name of the game

    • getNickname

      String getNickname()
      Gets the player's nickname.
      Returns:
      the player's nickname

    • chooseTokenSetupPhase

      void chooseTokenSetupPhase(int readyPlayers, int neededPlayers, List<TokenColor> tokenColorList, String gameName) throws GenericException
      Handles the token choice setup phase when all players have joined the game.
      Parameters:
      readyPlayers - the number of players ready
      neededPlayers - the number of players needed to start the game
      tokenColorList - the list of available token colors
      gameName - the name of the game
      Throws:
      GenericException - if an error occurs during token selection

    • startView

      void startView()
      Starts the view of the game.

    • setVirtualServer

      void setVirtualServer(ServerInterface virtualServer)
      Sets the virtual server.
      Parameters:
      virtualServer - the virtual server to be set

    • handUpdate

      void handUpdate(String playerNickname, List<Integer> availableCard)
      Updates a player's hand.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      availableCard - the list of available cards to set in the player's hand

    • setSerialCommonObjectiveCard

      void setSerialCommonObjectiveCard(List<Integer> serialCommonObjectiveCard)
      Sets the serial numbers of common objective cards.
      Parameters:
      serialCommonObjectiveCard - the list of common objective cards' serial numbers of the game

    • updateGoldCardsAvailableToDraw

      void updateGoldCardsAvailableToDraw(Map<Integer,Boolean> goldCardSerial)
      Updates the list of gold cards available to draw.
      Parameters:
      goldCardSerial - a map of gold card serial numbers and the shown side

    • updateResourceCardsAvailableToDraw

      void updateResourceCardsAvailableToDraw(Map<Integer,Boolean> resourceCardSerial)
      Updates the resource cards available to draw.
      Parameters:
      resourceCardSerial - a map of resource card serial numbers and the shown side

    • checkForExistingGame

      void checkForExistingGame()
      Checks for existing games previously created and still in the joining phase.

    • joiningPhase

      void joiningPhase(Map<String,Integer> gameNameWaitingPlayersMap) throws GenericException
      Manages the joining phase of a game.
      Parameters:
      gameNameWaitingPlayersMap - a map of game names and the number of waiting players.
      Throws:
      GenericException - if an error occurs during the joining phase.

    • placeStartCardSetupPhase

      void placeStartCardSetupPhase(String playerNickname, TokenColor tokenColor) throws GenericException
      Handles the start card setup phase.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      tokenColor - the color of the player's token
      Throws:
      GenericException - if an error occurs during card placement

    • choosePrivateObjectiveCard

      void choosePrivateObjectiveCard(String playerNickname, List<Integer> privateObjectiveCards) throws GenericException
      Manages the choice of the private objective card.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      privateObjectiveCards - the list of available private objective cards
      Throws:
      GenericException - if an error occurs during card selection

    • onPlacedCard

      void onPlacedCard(String playerNickname, int serialCardPlaced, boolean isFlipped, int x, int y, int turn, List<Coordinates> availableCells)
      Handles the event when a card is placed by a player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      serialCardPlaced - the serial number of the placed card
      isFlipped - whether the card is flipped or not
      x - the x-coordinate of the card placement
      y - the y-coordinate of the card placement
      turn - the current turn number
      availableCells - the list of available cells for the next placement

    • setPrivateObjectiveCard

      void setPrivateObjectiveCard(String playerNickname, int indexPrivateObjectiveCard, int readyPlayers, int neededPlayers)
      Sets the selected private objective card for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      indexPrivateObjectiveCard - the index of the selected private objective card
      readyPlayers - the number of players ready
      neededPlayers - the number of players needed to start the game

      Handles the event of closing a game due to a player disconnection.
